# Clockify Test Documentation

This is a small test knowledge base for integration testing.

## Time Tracking

### Getting Started

To start tracking time in Clockify, follow these steps:

1. Click the timer button in the top right corner of your dashboard
2. Enter a description of what you're working on
3. Select a project (optional)
4. Click "Start" to begin tracking

The timer will continue running until you click "Stop". All time entries are saved automatically.

### Manual Time Entry

If you forgot to start the timer, you can add time manually:

1. Click the plus (+) button in the time entries section
2. Enter the start and end time
3. Add a description
4. Select the project and tags
5. Click "Add" to save the entry

Manual entries are useful for tracking past work or adding breaks.

### Keyboard Shortcuts

Use keyboard shortcuts to work faster:
- `Ctrl+Alt+K` - Start/stop timer
- `Ctrl+Alt+L` - Add manual entry
- `Ctrl+Alt+R` - Open reports

## Projects and Tasks

### Creating Projects

To create a new project:

1. Navigate to "Projects" in the sidebar
2. Click "Create new project"
3. Enter project name and client
4. Set billing rate (optional)
5. Add team members
6. Click "Create"

Projects help you organize your work and generate reports by category.

### Project Templates

Use templates to quickly set up common project structures:

1. Go to "Projects" > "Templates"
2. Select a template or create your own
3. Templates can include pre-defined tasks and billable rates
4. Apply template when creating new projects

Templates save time on project setup.

## Reports

### Generating Reports

To view your time tracking reports:

1. Click "Reports" in the sidebar
2. Select date range
3. Choose report type (Summary, Detailed, Weekly)
4. Filter by project, user, or tag
5. Click "Generate" to view results

Reports can be exported to CSV, PDF, or Excel format.

### Custom Reports

Create custom reports for specific needs:

1. Use the "Custom" report type
2. Select fields to include
3. Add filters and grouping
4. Save as template for future use

Custom reports provide flexibility for unique reporting requirements.

## Integrations

### Jira Integration

Integrate Clockify with Jira to track time on issues:

1. Go to Settings > Integrations
2. Select "Jira" from the list
3. Enter your Jira URL and API token
4. Map Clockify projects to Jira projects
5. Enable time tracking on Jira issues

Once integrated, you can start timers directly from Jira issues.

### Slack Integration

Connect Clockify to Slack for quick time tracking:

1. Install the Clockify app from Slack App Directory
2. Authorize the app to access your workspace
3. Use `/clockify` command to track time
4. View recent entries with `/clockify list`
5. Stop timers with `/clockify stop`

The Slack integration keeps you in your workflow.

## Pricing and Plans

### Free Plan

The Clockify free plan includes:

- Unlimited users
- Unlimited time tracking
- Unlimited projects
- Basic reports
- Basic integrations

Perfect for small teams and individuals getting started.

### Premium Plans

Upgrade to premium for advanced features:

- **Basic**: $3.99/user/month - Custom fields, invoicing
- **Standard**: $5.49/user/month - Time audit, scheduled reports
- **Pro**: $7.99/user/month - Forecasting, approval workflows
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing - SSO, dedicated support

All plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required.

### Billing and Invoicing

Premium plans offer advanced billing features:

1. Set billable rates per project or user
2. Generate invoices based on tracked time
3. Export invoices to PDF
4. Track payment status
5. Send invoices directly to clients

Invoicing streamlines the billing process for agencies and freelancers.

## Troubleshooting

### Timer Not Working

If your timer isn't starting:

1. Check your internet connection
2. Refresh the browser page
3. Clear browser cache
4. Try a different browser
5. Contact support if issue persists

Most timer issues are resolved with a simple refresh.

### Sync Issues

If time entries aren't syncing across devices:

1. Ensure you're logged in on all devices
2. Check internet connectivity
3. Force sync by clicking refresh button
4. Wait a few minutes for automatic sync
5. Contact support if sync fails repeatedly

Syncing typically happens within 30 seconds.
